Out of the Light - Less light you use, more things you will see

A horror game spiced with a little humor, made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3

Light plays an important role in this short game:

  • You need light to see where you are going
  • Light however hides the key which you need to get out of the house
  • Enemy can't see you, but lights and noises attracts it...
  • ...so don't run and use your light wisely

The Gameplay:
You and few more people are trapped inside house where dude with paperbag in his head keeps you captive. Prisoners also wear paperbag  so the captor is one of us... or just prisoner running through hallucinations? Maybe real captor is coming back soon...? However that paperbag dude doesn't like noises and lights and you have to escape from the house without disrupting him. And because you are warm-hearted, of course you'll  save  fellow prisoners by dragging them to front door so you can all leave the house happily. But front door is locked and you need to find the key. The problem is that key is made from something magical that won't show in light. Instead it glows in dark...

Obectives:

  • Find the front door key to get out (The key will randomly appear in a different location when a new game starts)
  • Drag your fellow prisoners to front door (Hint: pants)

Hints:

  • Open the doors for more light

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

C - Crouch

E - Open Door

Space - Jump

Mouse wheel - Adjust light brigthness

Left Mouse - Crap and drag

Right Mouse - Release

Credits
